definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Any plant of the genus hoya having fleshy leaves and usually nectariferous flowers.
sentences.chinese: 球蘭屬的任一種植物，肉質葉，花朵通常分泌蜜汁。

sentences.english: The carcass performance and meat qualities of different hybridized combination finishing pigs was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同雜交組合育肥豬胴體品質和肉質特性。

sentences.english: Properly cooked, they're as tender as butter.
sentences.chinese: 適當烹調後，肉質像黃油般滑嫩。

sentences.english: Taproot slender, branched, woody, not fleshy, usually brown.
sentences.chinese: 直根纖細，分開，通常，木質，不肉質棕色。

sentences.english: Within a week the fleshy leaves started to whither and, weirdly, turn a bit mushy.
sentences.chinese: 在一週內，肉質葉開始蔓延，奇怪地變成糊狀。

sentences.english: This cooking way can make the shell more red, and the meat more tasty.
sentences.chinese: 這種烹飪方法能使蝦殼看上去更紅，肉質更鮮美。

sentences.english: Water—plums which have soft pulp and much juice are not suitable for this kind of processing.
sentences.chinese: 肉質柔軟多汁的水梅類品種不宜作原料加工。

sentences.english: Capsule dehiscing loculicidally or septicidally , rarely fruit fleshy and indehiscent.
sentences.chinese: 蒴果縱向開裂或者室間開裂，很少爲肉質和不裂的果。

sentences.english: Aristichthys Nobilis diseased less, growing fast, tasty when cooked.
sentences.chinese: 鱅魚病害少，生長快，肉質鮮美。

sentences.english: Gannan navel orange fruit large thin, succulent crisp, bright orange-red, rich flavor.
sentences.chinese: 贛南臍橙果大皮薄，肉質脆嫩，橙紅鮮豔，富有香味。

sentences.english: Huating succulent beef tender, nutrient-rich, delicate elastic cortex.
sentences.chinese: 華亭肉牛肉質細嫩，營養豐富，皮質細膩彈性好。

sentences.english: We carefully choose only the eye round beef with highest quality, which has the big shape, tender taste and regular shape.
sentences.chinese: 精選優質牛肉的圓眼肉部分，塊狀粗大，肉質鮮嫩。

sentences.english: You know, a carbon-based intelligence that goes through a meat stage.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，那是一種經歷肉質階段的碳基生命。

sentences.english: Several large beeves were slaughtered, and we can testify as to the excellent quality of the meat.
sentences.chinese: 集市上有幾大塊宰殺好的牛肉，我們看得出肉質極好。

sentences.english: Short, thickened, mostly underground stem that constitutes the resting stage of certain seed plants.
sentences.chinese: 某些種子植物休眠期一種短而粗的肉質地下莖。

sentences.english: Water retention and lipid content determine juiciness.
sentences.chinese: 保水性和脂質含量決定着肉質的多汁性。

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
flexible/not rigid/spongy/soft or runny (not set hard)/loose (soil)
grease/greasy food/oily/rich (of food)/fatty/greasy and dirty/a slippery character
